      • getTypeName

        private String getTypeName(Class c)
        Returns component name + "[]" if c is array, or class name otherwise.
        Parameters:
        c - class to get name
        Returns:
        String which contains name of the class

      • printMethod

        private String printMethod(Method method)
        Makes implementation of given Method. Implementation returns default value. Parameters are called according variableName. Uses StringBuilder to make string.
        Parameters:
        method - method to implement
        Returns:
        string, which contains implementation of method
        See Also:
        Method, StringBuilder

      • printConstructor

        private String printConstructor(Constructor constructor,
                                String className)
        Makes implementation of given Constructor. Implementation calls super from given parameters. Parameters are called according variableName. Uses StringBuilder to make string.
        Parameters:
        constructor - constructor to write
        className - name of the class for constructor
        Returns:
        string, which contains implementation of constructor
        See Also:
        Constructor, StringBuilder

        list - List to collect methods.

      • hasPubOrProtOrDefConstructors

        private boolean hasPubOrProtOrDefConstructors(Class<?> token)
        Checks if given Class has public or protected or default constructors.
        Parameters:
        token - Class to check
        Returns:
        true if given Class has public or protected or default Constructor, false otherwise.

      • implement

        public void implement(Class token,
                      File root)
               throws ImplerException
        Creates a class that implements or extends given class/interface. Output file is created in the folder that corresponds to the package of given class/interface. Output file contains java class, that implements or extends given class or interface and compiles without errors.
        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - class or interface will be implemented
        root - directory to create class implementation
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if class can't be implemented or error while writing occurred
        See Also:
        ImplerException

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Creates class that implements given class/interface. If the first argument is "-jar", it puts implemented class into jar-file. Otherwise create .java file in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments from the command line
        See Also:
        implement(java.lang.Class, java.io.File), implementJar(java.lang.Class<?>, java.io.File)

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(Class<?> token,
                         File jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Creates jar-file which contains class that implements given class/interface. Creates directory and generates implementation of the class c using implement(java.lang.Class, java.io.File). Then compile this class and create jar-file.
        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - class to implement
        jarFile - file to print to
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if class can't be implemented or error while writing occurred
        See Also:
        ImplerException, implement(java.lang.Class, java.io.File)
